TextView.android:text: Durga temple existed because of kodaganallur. People came from neighbour villages .Kodaganallur was surrounded by thorns forest,these people removed thorns and cattle grazing was done here to protect cows and sheep.They where worshiping durgaiamman so kodaganallur people used to tease them. Kodagan kalvai was created by these people. And they destroyed all the thorns forest which was later changed into cultivation land. South puthukudi kallur people from different places came here and built this temple .Ponnayakonar heads the temple stone architecture .
